News.headline: Tickets: Barrow AFC v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Tickets: Barrow AFC v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Tickets: Barrow AFC v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Daggers’ trip to Holker Street on Saturday 18th March, 3:00pm KO
News.description:
The away fans will be based in the Holker Street End for the trip to Barrow AFC.

Please note that this game will be pay on the day only and proof of age and/or student status may be required at the time of purchase. Valid forms of ID include passport, driving licence, NUS card, birth certificate.

Ticket Prices:

Terrace:
Adult - £14.00
Concession (65+) - £11.00
Student - £8.00
11-17 year old - £5.00
Under 11 - £1.00

Seating:
Adult - £17.00
Concession (65+) - £12.00
Student - £10.00
11-17 year old - £8.00
Under 11 - £3.00

Disabled/Wheelchair Information:
Disabled/Wheelchair fans will pay the appropriate age category with the carer going free of charge
